name: Payment
description:
Payment is an augmented reality animated short film.

Written by Jafei Pollitt, animated by Steven Harmon, voice acting by Bryce Riffle.

Android Instructions

On devices running Android 8.0 (API level 26) and higher you must enable the Allow app installs setting for that source within the Install unknown apps system settings screen.

On devices running Android 7.1.1 (API level 25) and lower, they should enable the Unknown sources setting in Settings > Security

Allow permissions for camera and wave your phone at the floor and walk around a bit to calibrate the floor plane before tapping and placing the set at your feet to begin.
